name: Must Protect (itch)
description:
A small and simple game that goes on forever protecting the green pylon, see how long you last!!! the longer you play, the stronger enemies get.

Kill, Upgrade, Repeat!!!

Controls :

  • Left-Click : Action, Shoot
  • Right-Click : Reload

note : -- Fullscreen Recommended --

Game Developed by : @GreenVeee

no music T-T
